com.orientechnologies.orient.core.index

Class OIndexManagerAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.type.ODocumentWrapper
      • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.type.ODocumentWrapperNoClass
        • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.index.OIndexManagerAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OCloseable, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OIndexManagerRemote, OIndexManagerShared

    public abstract class OIndexManagerAbstract
extends ODocumentWrapperNoClass
implements OCloseable
    Abstract class to manage indexes.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--(at)--orientdb.com)

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: OCloseable
        Closes resources inside of call of OStorage#close(). So do not use locks when you call this method or you may have deadlock during storage close. This method is completely house keeping method and plays role of Object#finalize() in case of you need to clean up resources after storage is closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface OCloseable
